programmes.show_description: A new group of charter guests arrive with high spirits and even higher expectations. As Sandy joins the guests for dinner, Mathew puts extra pressure on himself to impress.
A childhood issue resurfaces which causes David embarrassment, which is only compounded when Patrick shows understanding. And Moira gets on social media.
Moira and Johnny make it their mission to find an investor for a new motel; Ted and Alexis struggle to make their long-distance relationship work.

A team of engineers explain how they used technology to create a jet suit similar to the one in the movie "Iron Man" that can propel users in the air.

Four strangers work as a team to answer general knowledge questions. They must defeat the Chaser, a ruthless quiz genius, in order to win money.
A man does not want to give up his storage obsession; a woman struggles to get rid of her possessions because of sentimental attachment.
Quiz hosted by Lee Mack in which the questions are all about logic and common sense, with 100 contestants in every show having a chance of winning up to Â£100,000.
For the first time ever, America votes on who the bombshells must couple up with. An Islander gets dumped from the villa.
Sandoval feels nervous about helping Brock with his latest scheme to marry Scheana; the crew travels to a winery to celebrate James and Raquel's engagement.
Lisa Vanderpump must manage the unruly wait staff of her popular restaurant SUR.

Comedy series. Alexis puts together a premiere for Crows, while David gives his support to Patrick after he has his wisdom teeth removed.
Comedy series. After the red carpet video went viral, Moira and Alexis manage to find a way to make it look positive. Bob starts dating again - with a little help.

Following the work of the Dyfed-Powys Police. Traffic cop Casper deals with a drug driver, while PC Kelly Jones has her hands full with loose horses on the outskirts of Tenby.
